messages.title: Only Jean can beat the SNP here
messages.content: Elections in Ross, Skye and Lochaber are between the Scottish Liberal Democrats and the SNP. At the last General Election in 2015 Charles Kennedy was the clear challenger to the SNP with the Conservatives and Labour trailing far behind in third and fourth place. Only a vote for Jean Davis will help beat the SNP at this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose the Conservative's Destructive hard Brexit.
Invest in Scottish education and mental health.
